author: Staff Reporter
text:
Welfare assistance to the tune of Rs.2.25 lakh has been distributed to 89 beneficiaries during the weekly grievances day meeting at the Collectorate on Monday.

Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan distributed the assistance to the beneficiaries under the Uzhavar Paadhukaappu Thittam, maternity assistance, old age pension, deserted women and widow pension etc.

Sewing machines were distributed to 23 and ironing machine to eight beneficiaries.

District Revenue Officer A. Udhayakumar, Special Deputy Collector (SSS) Subbiah and District Backward Class and Minorities Welfare Officer S. Shanmugaraj were present.
title: Rs.2.25-lakh assistance distributed
